item.description:
@dracar wrote:

what is used for first loggin, so um heres an example of wat i have, its rong…

if (GetLastLogin(lastlogintime) <= 20070005)
{
 firstloginMenu();
}else{MainHelpMenu();}

i need to replace the condition with like if firstconnect or sumthin… o man i cant word it right, hopefully sum1 understands[br][size=1]Posted on: January 05, 2007, 09:26:24 PM[/size][hr]oh i realized wat i need, i need to know how to tell it if (lastconnect == currentday, current time)
im not good with nething related to time, so i cant figure it out
